verses.text: Tzin xajanej Jehová, yujto ix yab' in lesal ayic ix in tevi t'ay.
Yujto ix yab' tas ix in k'an t'ay, yuj chi' ol val in b'a t'ay yacb'an pitzan into.
Ijan val ix in yamchaj yuj chamel. Ix ja syaelal chamel t'ayin. Ha ilk'olal yet' yaelal ix javi t'a vib'anh.
Ichato chi' ix valan in b'ha t'a Jehová. Ix in tevi t'ay yic syak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
Ha Jehová, tojol toni, tz'ok' sk'ol t'ayonh. Ha co Diosal, yelxo val te niwan swach'k'olal.
Ha stanhvan eb' emnaquil yeq'ui. Ayic toxo ix el vip, a ix in colani.
Ayxo in junk'olal ticnaic svab'i, yujto a Jehová wach' ix yutej sk'ol t'ayin.
Maj in scha chamlaj, ix in scol t'a in cusk'olal, maj in schalaj telvoc.
Yacb'an pitzan into ol in k'anab'ajej.
Ix vak'och Jehová yipoc in k'ool, t'a skal in niwan yaelal ix valani: Te ya ayin, xin chi.
Manhxo animaoc vaj svab'i, yuj chi' ix vala' to masanil eb' anima, max yal-laj cak'anoch tas syal eb' yipoc co k'ool.
¿Tas ol vutej vak'an spak masanil swach'k'olal Jehová ix yak' t'ayin?
Ol vik'cot vino ofrendail t'ay yuj vak'an yuj diosal t'ay, yujto ix in scolo'.
Ha t'a yichanh masanil schonhab' ol vaq'uelk'och tas ix val t'ay.
Te niwan yelk'och t'a yichanh Jehová ayic scham junok mach yicxo.
Mamin Jehová, a in ton tik, a checab' in. Ha ach ix in a coleli, yuj chi' libre in ticnaic.
Ol vak' in silab' yuj ak'oj yuj diosal t'ayach yuj spacoc a wach'k'olal. Ol val in b'a t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, ol vaq'uelk'och in ti' t'ayach t'a yichanh masanil eb' a chonhab',
t'a yamaq'uil a templo t'a snanhal chonhab' Jerusalén. Scal wach' lolonel t'ayach Jehová.
